contents.item: Put your converted time into something productive
God treats us the same way we treat one another
Time utilization and effectiveness is a major marker for success
You don’t count or matter when you don’t live an effective life
Losing your job releases you from the control of the world system
Don’t just make use of a gift, look inside you and maximize others
To be productive, effective and to live a life of understanding and wisdom is not to waste time
Knowing what to do with time is the key to being productive
To work for God effectively, you have to expand and stretch yourself
Time wasters are life wasters
Your calling is in what you read, think and talk about
Love is the primary nature of God
It’ll never be too late to start to make use of the time you still have left
Getting fired from work is not a death sentence
Always invest your life in your calling and purpose
An effective life is a fulfilled one
We were created by God to carry out and fulfill His divine purpose for our lives
See God in everyone regardless of who or where they are
Life is a race against disappearing time
Human existence is as a result of the product of time
You can create any product from time
Be strategic and purposeful in whatever you do
Find time to meditate and see how you can improve your life and achieve your goals
Joblessness gives you the resource through which you can create a new you
Monitor and control every passing day so as to live without regrets
As you grow older, you become faced with the problem of what to with your time
We were sent to earth to fulfill our mandate and life’s purpose
God is aware of the hypocrisy in the hearts of men
Don’t exert all your energy on employment, locate your purpose
You can only build yourself effectively in the area of your calling
Celebrating God in people should be part of our lives as Christians
The ministry of Christ is related to fellowshipping with people
The secret of effective living is detachment
Never give up just because you failed initially
Work is a means to fulfill your heavenly mandate
You cannot understand God without understanding people
The service of God is in people
Life is not about longevity but about effectiveness
Money is a compensation for time spent
There is a huge difference between work and a job
Time is a diminishing factor
Time is the source of all things
Making a product is just an activity, making a profit on a product is the achievement.
Nothing is possible without time
Stop wasting your life and discover who you are
Your calling should be your work
Information that a book possesses is made of time
The disappearing time is the race of life
We were created to purposefully live a life that glorifies God
The amount of time spent doing something is what adds value to it
Only people who believe in themselves are able to do exploits
Celebrate and appreciate people that cannot reward you
Break free from the contract of employment
To convert a day is to produce a product
Being rich or famous does not equate an effective life
Life should be used to fulfill the purposes of the Kingdom
Discovering yourself is the major key to being successful
We celebrate God when we share in each other’s joy and pain
Human existence is as a result of the evolution of time
Uplifting God’s Kingdom on earth should be our life’s mandate as believers
Losing your job releases you to think effectively and make rational decisions
You need to invest time in understanding and discovering yourself
Dedicate time to yourself and do things that help you grow
The nature of Christ is love
Stop trying to make a living and begin to live
Time is one of the most important components of life
Never let a day be your control factor
Wisdom solves almost anything
Effectiveness of love must be measured by concrete results
You shouldn’t live for yourself alone but you must also learn to live the Christian life
Time spent wisely gets compensated
Never see yourself as a disappointment or failure just because you were fired
The first thing to do after you get fired is to discover God
Work is an instrument through which you build yourself
A selfish life isn’t God’s purpose for you
You must invest quality time in your land to become great
Until you believe in yourself, it does not matter how much you believe in God
If you are not living in active consciousness, you will always be lost
When you invest in life, you are being fruitful and productive
Life is the subtotal of time
No amount of money can compensate losing your purpose
It’s either you are converting your time or not
Your life should be of benefit to others and you should always inspire them
Always spend your time on things that add value and purpose to your life
Your calling helps you to have goals
Your time is the life you have at a particular moment
The best way to appreciate God is to appreciate His creation
Convert your knowledge into product
You can only prove your love to God when you love people that do not deserve your love
Joblessness gives you liberty
